itemDescription: British croquet player, structural engineer and university teacher (1922-2016)

wikipedia_page.main: Bernard George Neal (29 March 1922 – 26 March 2016) was a professor of structural engineering at Imperial College London and the winner of the All England croquet championship on 38 occasions.

response: **Bernard Neal, 93, structural engineer and croquet player.
*Bernard Neal, 93, British structural engineer and croquet player.Professor Bernard Neal

After graduation Horne worked as an assistant engineer for the River Great Ouse Catchment Board before moving back to Cambridge to work with John Baker, Baron Baker, :de:Jacques Heyman and Bernard Neal.
